properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 3:52AM EST until February 16 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to
Nantucket MA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
